body.name: Hallmark Blank Cards Assortment with Organizer, Black & White Stripes (40 Flat Paneled Note Cards with Envelopes)

features: Ideal for gift enclosures and everyday notes, this 40-ct. pack of cards ensures you'll never miss an opportunity to say "thank you," "thinking of you," and anything in between.

The perfect gift for a coworker, teachers, or any stationery lover in your life, boxed set contains 40 flat note cards with matching envelopes and a reusable, decorative card caddy for organization and storage.
Each card in this blank notecard set has a colored border (10 each of light gray, dark gray, navy blue, and black) and plenty of room to write your own personal message for any occasion.
Pack includes 40 cards. Each single-panel notecard measures 5.2" x 3.75".
Hallmark's stationery is made with paper from well-managed forests.
body.description: Box of blank, flat-paneled cards makes expressing thanks, encouragement, or any other special message, easy. Cards come with coordinating envelopes and a card organizer with a timeless striped design to keep on hand in your favorite writing space and use for future card storage. The Hallmark brand is widely recognized as the very best for greeting cards, gift wrap, and more. For more than 100 years, Hallmark has been helping its customers make everyday moments more beautiful and celebrations more joyful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give them a reason to smile. In good times and bad, find the perfect card to remind them you care.

Cheer them on Celebrate new jobs, promotions, graduations and other achievements with cool cards that congratulate their hard work and determination. Celebrate their love Send them your best wishes for a happy life together with sweet cards for every kind of couple. Lift them up Show your support in tough times and encourage them to keep going with cards that remind them you have their back.

Hallmark Paper Wonder Pop Up Congratulations Card for Graduation (Disco Balls) Hallmark Wedding Card (Removable Keepsake Wooden Heart Ornament) Hallmark Modern Floral Thinking of You Cards Hallmark Paper Wonder Potted Plant Pop-up Card Hallmark Just Because Cards Assortment with Card Organizer Box Purchase includes: 1 pop-up card with envelope 1 card with ornament attachment and envelope 2 cards with envelopes 1 pop-up card with envelope 10 cards with envelopes, 1 organizer box with dividers Design Blue and pink card with "OMG!" lettering and disco balls Gray with wooden heart ornament attachment Foil sketched flowers with "Thinking of You" and "Our thoughts are with you" lettering Fern plant with black and white planter and blue "You're on my mind" micro card 5 designs including leaves, bear, sun and script lettering Perfect for: Bridal showers, graduations, new jobs Weddings Sympathy, get well soon, thinking of you Encouragement, support, sympathy Congratulations, thinking of you, get well soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use .! Note allow you to write a short note! Great for adding a thank you note to those online sales for a more personal touch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cards to keep on hand
reviews.reviewText: Love having these cards on hand to write thank you’s or any other miscellaneous letter to people. Recommend only for short notes, not for a longer letter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only Two-Sided Smaller Card and Envelope
reviews.reviewText: These are very stylish, but are only two sided (no folds) and are small cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black border is a little somber
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and size; will just use a fun color pen to write on the black border cards

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice variety/Wish they were larger
reviews.reviewText: These are very nice notecards and a great value for the price. The colors are nice and thickness of the paper stock is decent. However, I wish there were larger. The size forces you to carefully select your words.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the job I had
reviews.reviewText: The cards are used as sturdy book plates for autographs and they're working for me. I like the little carry box. I just have to cut the fronts off, get the autographs, and paste those into my books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way Too Small
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these as they looked like full size notecards (I assumed they might be 41/2 x 6 like most cards....and I did not read the description carefully enough), but they are extremely small and really create a limited opportunity to write anything other than about two sentences.Quality is fine, but would not buy again due to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice level, works great!
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised. Gets the job done
